forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a brilliant sun embraces the day, casting a golden glow across the iconic skyline. The temperature hovers pleasantly, inviting relaxation yet tempered by a gentle west-southwest breeze that rustles through the streets, hinting at the softer, more temperate moments of the afternoon. With visibility unfettered by fog, the scene feels expansive, revealing the contours of the hills and the shimmering waters of the Bay. Light wisps of cloud might tease the edges of the horizon, but an overall clarity reigns, allowing for sweeping views that emphasize the architectural splendor of the city.

As the day unfolds, temperatures will gently decline, mirroring the sun’s descent. In this enviable weather, a light layer—perhaps a cardigan or a breezy jacket—will serve you well, especially as evening approaches and the coolness settles in. Consider embarking on modest explorations today; a café visit with a friend offers a perfect backdrop to discuss the world, or perhaps a leisurely stroll through the nearby park, where you can watch the interplay of afternoon light on the leafy trees and vibrant flowers. Enjoy the present moment, for days like these, bathed in sunshine and serenity, breathe a charm uniquely their own.
